name: Turmeric,Ashwagandha
Precautions: Add the turmeric into curries and add it on boiling water when ater is startied cooling take cloth and dip it int that turmeric water keep 2min on joints where the paining starts
-->: Ashwagandha--It is also known as Indian ginseng it has been using since 100 years for joints treatment
Advantages: Since it is made up up of natural materials it doesn't cause any side effects and good to health  and body

name: Echinacea
Usage: It is usually taken as tea or supplement but it can also be applied topically
-->: It is a flowering plant frequently used to treat and prevent the common cold , ands by tying the plant flower to a cloth and use it in place of wound it can reduce the plain and cure it at home without side effects or side disesa from that wound
Prescription: Use in tea morning either evening for stomach upset use it after taking some food

name: Ginkgo biloba
Usage: It has a long history in treating blood disorders and memory issues
-->: Ginkgo biloba should take in either morning or evening  but many prefer taking it Morning
How to take it: It can be taken along with like mixing some amount  of it on tea OR oral tablet
Precautions: Don't take raw , it can be poisonous and Children should use who are below 8years
side effects: If younuse heavy mount of it ,it can cause headache, allergic skin,Constipation
